Product Title: The Beachwaver Co. S1.25 Dual Voltage, White
Review Date: 2019/07/25
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'This ceramic, rotating curling iron provides easy, quality waves in minutes!', 'Shape': 'Barrel', 'Brand': 'The Beachwaver Co.', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Product Dimensions': '15.75 x 1.75 x 2 inches; 15.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': '4354716121', 'UPC': '817741020620 817741022730', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/SB10T'}
Review Text: This curling wand is awesome... especially for long hair... it has digital adjustable setting... The wand is 1.25" width... it's 5.5" length of wand...  it has a swivel cord... the rotating wand takes this curling wand to a whole other level... it also has a rotating fast or slow button... strong and sturdy and made of great quality...
Review Title: Rotating curling iron
Rating: 5.0

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Enthusiast:** Demonstrates a strong interest in hair styling tools, specifically curling irons that offer quality performance and convenience.
- **Preference for Versatility:** Values products that cater to different hair types and lengths, indicating a focus on versatility in hair tools.
- **Quality and Functionality:** Prioritizes high-quality materials (e.g., ceramic) and features like adjustable settings, indicating a preference for durable and effective products.
- **User Experience:** Emphasizes user-friendly design aspects, such as rotating functionality and swivel cords, suggesting a preference for ease of use in hair styling.
- **Attention to Performance:** Rates products highly (5.0) based on performance and functionality, indicating a discerning attitude towards product effectiveness. 

Overall, this user favors high-quality, versatile hair styling tools that provide an efficient and enjoyable styling experience.
